name: Take that bush back!
description:
Made for the Curdle Jam 5.

Title: Take that bush back.

How to play :

The bunnies stole the squirels bush.

Take that bush back.
To win you need to extend your territory to the 9 cases arround the bush.

Align 3 acorns to make a shrub.
Align 3 shrubs to make a oak.

Acorns, shrubs and oaks extend your territory.
Shrubs and oakss give you more acorns.

Caution ! Bunnies will try to eat your plants.
Acorns can be used to make bunnies run away.

Music: Bumbling by Pictures of the Floating World Downloaded from freemusicarchive.org
